author: H

review: Fire TV is so much better than Apple TV. It's faster, offers more, and simply awesome. I have all Apple devices from iPhone to Mac Pro, and when I first used my Apple TV I was extremely disappointed. But I held on to it because I thought an update would fix or improve it. However, after a year, it never happened. I saw the Fire TV being marked down and I had some Amazon credit to use so I decided to give it a try. Plus all the reviews were very positive. Well, right out of the box I was impressed, I really like the packaging. Then once I hooked it up I was sold. If you've got Amazon Prime then it's even more awesome. The Fire TV is very impressive and far better than Apple TV. If your curious or looking for a device that brings internet to your TV then try the Fire TV. You won't be disappointed. I can't say it enough....it's simply amazing. Great Job Amazon.

author: wolfophile

review: I was looking for a replacement for my Apple TV, since the iOS upgrade made all of my older idevices useless. I thought this was a perfect opportunity to try the Amazon Fire TV. Ordered it and received it almost immediately. But when I plugged everything in, I couldn't get to the home screen. I was using wifi, but to get it to work, I had to move it to a place where I had a lan drop. In other words, I was unable to install it in my house over wifi, had to have a cable to my router. Instructions fail to mention this fact. Now it works fine, other than that it rarely turns itself off. Seems to always have the power light on. Don't know why, but it doesn't draw much current so I am not too worried.  Overall, I wish the setup was easier. Had to figure it out on my own.
